title: The Infinite and the Divine
author: Robert Rath
description: Trazyn the Infinite and Orikan the Divine are locked in a struggle that spans millennia.

title: Lion: Son of the Forest
author: Mike Brooks
description: The Primarch returns to a galaxy of darkness and finds his lost sons.

title: The Emperor's Legion
author: Chris Wraight
description: The Golden Guardians and the Silent Sisterhood defend the Throneworld.

title: Devastation of Baal
author: Guy Haley
description: The entire Blood Angels lineage gathers to defend their home from Hive Fleet Leviathan.

title: Helsreach
author: Aaron Dembski-Bowden
description: Chaplain Grimaldus leads the defense of Hive Helsreach against the Ork Waaagh!.

title: Brutal Kunnin
author: Mike Brooks
description: Ufthak Blackhawk leads his ladz on a raid against a vital Adeptus Mechanicus forge world.

title: Ghazghkull Thraka
author: Nate Crowley
description: The story of the greatest Warboss in the galaxy as told by his personal banner-bearer.

title: The Lords of Silence
author: Chris Wraight
description: A look at the inner workings and philosophical decay of a Death Guard warband.

title: Soul Hunter
author: Aaron Dembski-Bowden
description: The Night Lords struggle to survive in the wake of the Horus Heresy.

title: Betrayer
author: Aaron Dembski-Bowden
description: The Shadow Crusade rages as Angron and Lorgar descend into madness.

title: The Carrion Throne
author: Chris Wraight
description: Inquisitor Crowl uncovers a dark conspiracy in the shadow of the Imperial Palace.

title: Gaunt's Ghosts
author: Dan Abnett
description: Colonel-Commissar Ibram Gaunt leads the Tanith First and Only into the Sabbat Worlds.

title: Cadian Blood
author: Aaron Dembski-Bowden
description: When a shrine world falls to a plague, the Cadians are sent to reclaim it.

title: The Red Feast
author: Matthew Farrer
description: The tribal warriors of a primitive world are drawn into the path of the World Eaters.

title: Valedor
author: Guy Haley
description: The Aeldari must prevent two Hive Fleets from merging and becoming unstoppable.

title: Fifteen Hours
author: Mitchel Scanlon
description: A raw recruit learns the terrifying reality of life in the Imperial Guard.

title: Day of Ascension
author: Adrian Tchaikovsky
description: A forge world is ripe for revolution as the Star Children approach.

title: Crisis of Faith
author: Phil Kelly
description: Commander Farsight discovers truths that will change his Empire forever.

title: The Last Hunt
author: Robbie MacNiven
description: The White Scars hunt the Tyranid menace through a world of hunters.

title: The Emperor's Gift
author: Aaron Dembski-Bowden
description: The secret warriors of the Inquisition fight the First War for Armageddon.

title: Fulgrim
author: Graham McNeill
description: The tragedy of the Phoenix and his fall from perfection.

title: Storm of Iron
author: Graham McNeill
description: A fortress world is besieged by the masters of siege warfare.

title: Path of the Warrior
author: Gav Thorpe
description: An artist turns to the Path of the Warrior as the call of war beckons.

title: Genefather
author: Guy Haley
description: A battle of wits between Belisarius Cawl and Fabius Bile.

title: Warboss
author: Mike Brooks
description: The Orks of the Blood Axe clan vie for dominance in a brutal Waaagh!.

title: Assassinorum: Kingmaker
author: Robert Rath
description: Three assassins are sent to topple a planetary government on a Knight World.

title: Flesh and Steel
author: Guy Haley
description: A probator and an Adeptus Mechanicus investigator team up to solve a murder.

title: Dante
author: Guy Haley
description: The origin and rise of the legendary Commander of the Blood Angels.

title: Master of Sanctity
author: Gav Thorpe
description: The Interrogator-Chaplains hunt for the Fallen amidst secrets and shadows.

title: Gate of Bones
author: Andy Clark
description: The Indomitus Crusade hits a wall on the pilgrimage world of Gathalamor.

title: Fire Warrior
author: Simon Spurrier
description: A lone Shas'la fights for survival in a war zone gone wrong.

title: The Great Eat
author: Guy Haley
description: A horrific glimpse into the sheer scale of a Tyranid invasion.

title: The King of the Spoil
author: Jonathan D. Beer
description: Mystery and murder in the deepest levels of Hive Primus.

title: Execution Force
author: C.Z. Dunn
description: An Officio Assassinorum team attempts to kill a Chaos Sorcerer.

title: Grombrindal
author: David Guymer
description: The ancient White Dwarf finds a place in the new age of the Votann.

title: Knight of Talassar
author: Graham McNeill
description: Cato Sicarius fights to return from the warp and reclaim his honor.

title: The Last Council
author: Guy Haley
description: A high-stakes political drama set during the darkest days of the Heresy.

title: The Reverie
author: Peter Fehervari
description: Psychological horror as a Space Marine chapter begins to unspool.

title: Da Gobbo's Revenge
author: Ian St. Martin
description: A Red Gobbo leads a rebellion in the midst of a massive war.

title: Serpent and the Saint
author: Matthew Farrer
description: A Sister of Battle is tasked with protecting a potential saint.
